subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Natural ventilation or mechanical ventilation must be provided to all enclosed areas in a temporary structure.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Natural ventilation must as far as practicable consist of openings or devices which can be opened with an aggregate opening of not less than 5% of the floor area of the enclosed area.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Mechanical ventilation must as far as practicable comply with the relevant provisions of AS 1668.2.
